Kanhaiyya
Umar
Gurmehar
Hardik
Jignesh
Alpesh
Shehla
Tejaswi
Tejpratap

Intellectuals say these 2 kaudi ke Yuva Netas are our Future Leaders. They would've included Burhan Wani also in the list, but he has stopped checking his Twitter

Such a lovely visual. Haj House boundary wall is now saffron, building is white and gate is green. Seculars should praise Yogi Govt for implementing "Ganga-Jamuni Tehzeeb" !!pic.twitter.com/m6gS12iNgw

Lalu is seeking mercy, saying he is old and ill.

Haaye re be-chaara! ! Not his fault that court took 25 years to nail him. Judge sahab should order for him chaara meal in jail, that too sugar free

Hindu activist Deepak Rao was brutally murdered by Naushad, Rizwan, Nawaz & Nirshan, two days back in Congress-ruled Karnataka.

Looks like Secular Crime, otherwise we would see headlines like: Bloodthirsty Hindutva Mob Lynches Innocent Son of Muslim Headmaster in Modi's Gujarat

Media thugs are publishing cooked-up stories with cooked-up evidences  against #KulbhushanJadhav, so that Pakistan executes him, and they can show how Modi govt failed. Evil!

They Hate Modi so much that they Hate India now!

While an Indian citizen is being tortured by our enemy, Media thugs are trying their best to put his life in danger and damage India's cause....all in the garb of Freedom of Expression & Investigative Journalism. They should be booked for treason, @smritiirani !

Look at the consequences of your action @Raghav_Bahl @NandyGram !
India is working so hard to save Jadhav, but traitors like you are helping Pakistan's narrative. 
Aak thooo on you!pic.twitter.com/UeW1q2kpZC
Has @KapilSibal booked next hearing in HC/SC to get bail for Lalu? Please keep evidence of old age, chest pain, kidney failure, and good behaviour ready.
After 27 years, after looting crores, Lalu got only 3.5 years jail & 5 lakh fine. Itna saara chaara khaane ke baad, bas ittu sa gobar. Dhattt!!
Whattay achievement by so-called Indian paper! Can we exchange Quint journos for Kulbhushan, please?pic.twitter.com/UrSlcrHL0u

Only 1.7% Indians (2 crore) pay direct income tax. Only 48417 declared income more than 1 crore.

No "Yuva Neta" will talk about expanding tax slabs and reducing corruption. Everyone rants only about doles and reservation.

Ex cricketer Syed Kirmani goes back on his pledge to donate eyes because it is haraam in Islam.

Is accepting donated organs also haraam in Islam? Maybe Muslims should be fitted with organs of a bakra, because that's halaal.
Everything is haraam, except terrorism. Allahamudillah!pic.twitter.com/eflGMbFwgV

UP police to remove loudspeakers installed at religious places after Allahabad High Court's order over removal to curb noise pollution.

Ati uttam! Should be done all over Bharat. Jai Shri Ram. !

Editors Guild, comprising of @bdutt, @ShekharGupta, #KumarKetkar, #MKRazdan amongst others, condemns FIR against Tribune reporter for reporting lies on Aadhar.

When will this Editors Guild kitty party condemn Quint reporters for lies on Kulbhushan?

Govt must address Aadhar's data security.
But Liberals are opposing Aadhar because it helped detect & reduce corruption in subsidy, such as:

3.5 crore fake LPG connections
1.6 crore fake ration cards
4.4 lakh fake school students
93% fake teachers & professors
90% fake farmers
Yogi Sarkar !https://twitter.com/myogiadityanath/status/950032486511337472 …

600 railway stations to get WiFi by March 2018, all 8500 to get WiFi by March 2019

Delhi's Free WiFi is so strong that entire India's railway stations will get signals. Jai ho!

Vishwas says Kejriwal didn't care about Army's morale and questioned surgical strikes, so that Modi can be removed.

And Vishwas was so pained that he did sharyantra against himself to lose Rajya Sabha seat, so that he could tell us.
10 nahi 8. Priyu ji has corrupted your maths.

To cut travel expenses, India will send Haj pilgrims to Mecca by ship, not Air India flights

Secular:  Islam khatre me hai. Modi must resign.

India's first 14-lane highway - Delhi-Meerut Expressway - is complete in record 14 months, and reduces travel time from 3-4 hrs to 45 min.

Congress Yuva Netas: Reserve 3 lanes for Muslims, 3 lanes for Dalits, 3 lanes for Jats, 3 lanes for Gurjar, otherwise humse boora koi nahi

So deaths are of 2 types: NEGLIGIBLE and ELIGIBLE. Well done सड़जी! 

Jab aam aadmi Dilli ki thand me aakhri saans ginn raha tha, 

Aam aadmi ka CM Andaman me Guptaji ka maal ginn raha tha

@ArvindKejriwalpic.twitter.com/x7BagKnJ5l

BJP President is addressing large rallies in Tripura.

Congress President is doing Holiday Assignment to check which countries are receiving BJP's EVM signals through Bluetooth.pic.twitter.com/SGfycKI4yU

Supreme Court makes playing of National Anthem optional in cinema halls before movies.

Welcome it. Please rather play National Anthem and Vande Mataram before Court and Parliament proceedings. That way Liberals/Seculars will stop going there.

Hello @ndtv,  they didn't get arrested for just "respecting" Pakistani national anthem. They played Pakistani anthem instead of India's, in a stadium funded by India. If they "respect" Pakistan so much , they should be thrown onto the other side of the border with full "respect".pic.twitter.com/i4guVQacLw

World Bank says India has huge potential, projects 7.3% growth in 2018

Intellectual: World bank bika hua hai. Modi deposited 15 lakh in its account

SC sends notice why Kendra Vidyalayas make students sing Hindu prayer with closed eyes and folded hands, as it propagates Hinduism & causes issues for students of atheists and minorities. 

Do you find anything wrong in this Hindu prayer :pic.twitter.com/4PvehGfVvD

If singing these lines "promote Hinduism", then Supreme Court ji, Hinduism should be promoted more!

"Baha do prem ki ganga"

"Humein aapas me miljhulkar prabhu rehna sikha dena"

"Humara dharm ho seva, humara karm ho seva"

"Vatan par jaan fida karna, prabhu rehna sikha dena"

Asato ma sadgamaya (lead me from untruth to truth)
Tamaso ma jyotirgamaya (from Darkness to Light
Mrtyorma amrtam gamaya (from mortality to immortality)

There's no issue in these lines sung in Kendra Vidyalaya, except that they are in Sanskrit, and that's the issue SC has!

SC reopens 186 cases related to 1984 Sikh Genocide, will set up SIT to monitor probe

Hello @OfficeOfRG , Rajiv Gandhi deserves 'credit' for getting 10000 murdered. How forgetful of you to not tweet

Mizoram church offers to pay parents ₹4000 for fourth baby, ₹5000 for fifth, and so on.

Good Lord Jesus that some baba didn't say so, otherwise we'd be debating this on prime time.

Mamata is organising Brahmin Sammelan in Kolkata
BJP is organising Muslim convention in Kolkata

Secular party is doing Soft-Hindutva
Hindutva party is doing Soft-Secularism

Aur kitne achhe din chahiye?

Around 4000 arrests and 1000 encounters have happened in UP under Yogi Sarkar. Such is the fear that criminals are going to jail and not seeking bail.

Saara UP dol raha hai
Yogi Yogi bol raha hai
!

Virtual ID with one time password & limited KYC is welcome security layer for Aadhar. Why govt & @UIDAI arrogantly kept going with security flaws in a system that contains citizens' data, which cannot be returned once given? Launch half-baked system & do "continuous improvement"!

Govt is well-intentioned about using Aadhar to curb corruption, and majority of us joined this anti-corruption drive by linking all our data. Govt ought to take data security seriously, instead of being smug.

Lesser known fact: 
Champions of Data Privacy are also Champions of knowingly or unknowingly giving
Biometric data, Bank data, Personal Data, This data, That data,
to Facebook, Google, Twitter, This app That app,
on Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, This device, That device.

Instead of taking your personal, bank and biometric data directly from you by telling you, Aadhar guys should just buy it from Apple Samsung and other devices recording all your data whether you give your so-called consent or not.

ED attached 8000 cr property of Lalu's daughter. 
How did she earn so much?

She should be jailed, otherwise chindi chors taking ₹500 bribe and going to jail, will start looting crores, hire lawyer and drag case in court for 20 years at 1% loot fee.

Lalu's beti and damaad bought farmhouses in Delhi and Patna from 8000 crores raised through shell/fake companies.

Total Sannaata in Anti-corruption qila. Chalo itna hi bol do ki Modi govt is attacking Lalu because he belongs to 'backward caste'
What action is the country's President taking on the 4 judges for "contempt of court". High time Supreme Court gets overhauled and rinsed of the representatives of Tukde Tukde Gang

Didn't know whom to support - the CJI  or the 4 judges. 
Saw Presstitutes enthusiastically cheering the 4 judges.
No doubt left that the CJI is 'right'.

Makar Sankranti, Uttarayan, Bihu, Bhogi, Pongal, Lohri, Pous Pourbon! 

May the joyous season of many celebrations make your lives warm like the bonfire, sweet like the Gur and Rewari, fulfilling like the harvest, and soar high like the kites!
!

Supreme Court is busy in internal war, otherwise they would give us sermons like:

Celebrate green Lohri...
don't use wood

Celebrate smokeless Pongal...
don't do air pollution

Celebrate kiteless Makar Sakranti...
don't kill birds

Celebrate noiseless Bihu...
don't play drums
Takes courage to withdraw religious subsidy like Hajj. Why no praise from Progressive and Secular intellectuals? Maybe they are busy in organising another Intolerance wave.

Haj subsidy funds will be used for educational empowerment of women of minority community. 

Why only minority community, @naqvimukhtar ? Hindu tax bharey, par Minority Malai khaaye. Wah!

13 years after Army raised request, Govt approves purchase of 1.6 lakh assault rifles & carbines for frontline soldiers

What the hell was UPA govt doing? Stuffing Sonia's bank account was more important than addressing Army's needs!
NDA vs UPApic.twitter.com/jhBTv3qSvr

India successfully test-fired its most lethal and longest distance nuclear capable Agni V ballistic missile from Abdul Kalam island

Normal Indian: Yay! Jai Hind!

Commie Indian: India is trying to disturb peace in the subcontinent
Supreme Court has time to decide release of Padmaavat movie, but refuses to even hear plea about Kashmiri Pandit exodus, and lakhs of other cases. Supreme Court needs tuitions in deciding priorities
Congrats @ArvindKejriwal! Your dream of political revolution has come true - first time 21 corrupt MLAs are getting suspended for corruptionpic.twitter.com/C0jxHirRzc

11 jailed
3 FIRs
1 IT raid
2 CBI raid
20 facing suspension

37 AAP MLAs in news without spending a single rupee. 
Kyunki imaandar sarkar
May Maa Saraswati bless you with knowledge, wisdom and bliss. Best wishes for Basant Panchami !pic.twitter.com/pXMJI4kol8

Sensex hits 36,000 for first time

Intellectual: Only upper caste Hindus are allowed to invest. Modi should resign.

Is rape legal? Is rape promoted? Is rape a right? Is rape not a crime already?
What the hell do idiots like @renukash mean by "ban rape"?

Will rapist ever say, "dhatt teri ki! rape ban ho gaya, ab kya karu? aaj bada mann tha rape karne ka"pic.twitter.com/n7sszC6YFV

Arun Jaitley explained pre-GST sanitary pads had 13% GST. After GST and input credit, they have 3-4% GST. If no GST, Chinese products will kill Indian products.
Too much of sense for Ms nonsense who thrives on cheap publicity @mrsfunnybonespic.twitter.com/Kace8WylwL

Hi, I'm @mrsfunnybones

I compare tax-free Viagra of US with taxed sanitary pads of India

I ignore fact that India taxes Viagra at 12%

I replace Viagra with Khakhra using my funny bone

I ignore fact that Khakhra small scale industries employ lakhs of poor women

Please laugh!pic.twitter.com/q8qBiMBIeE

RT if you want @mrsfunnybones to distribute free sanitary pads with every rupee earned through her movie #Padman. It's all about social cause, right?
@akshaykumar
